title: Public Speaking 101
description: Gain the confidence to speak in front of others with clear pronunciation and strong delivery.
info:
Course Info

Speaking isn't just about grammar; it's about delivery. Learn how to project your voice, manage nervousness, and structure your speech for maximum impact.

quiz.question: What is a physical way to reduce anxiety before speaking?
quiz.correctFeedback: Yes! Deep breathing calms your nervous system.
quiz.incorrectFeedback: Caffeine might make you more jittery, and speaking fast shows nervousness.
